name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
steps: Boil spaghetti until al dente.
Heat olive oil and sauté garlic.
Add red chili flakes and cooked spaghetti.
Toss with parsley and serve.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
steps: Cut chicken into cubes and marinate in soy sauce and garlic.
Stir-fry chicken in olive oil until cooked.
Add vegetables and cook until tender.
Serve hot.

name: Vegetable Curry
steps: Heat oil and sauté onion and garlic.
Add vegetables and curry powder.
Pour coconut milk and simmer until vegetables are tender.
Serve with rice.

name: Pancakes
steps: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Whisk in milk and egg.
Cook on a hot pan with butter until golden.
Serve with syrup.

name: Grilled Salmon
steps: Marinate salmon with olive oil, lemon, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Grill salmon until cooked through.
Serve hot with vegetables.

name: Caesar Salad
steps: Grill chicken and slice.
Toss lettuce with dressing, croutons, and parmesan.
Top with sliced chicken and serve.

name: Tomato Soup
steps: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil.
Add chopped tomatoes and broth.
Simmer and blend until smooth.
Serve hot.

name: Beef Tacos
steps: Cook ground beef with spices.
Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, tomato, onion, and cheese.
Top with salsa and serve.

name: Veggie Stir Fry
steps: Heat olive oil and sauté garlic and ginger.
Add vegetables and stir-fry with soy sauce.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

name: Omelette
steps: Whisk eggs with milk, salt, and pepper.
Cook in a pan and add cheese, spinach, and tomato.
Fold and serve hot.
